 2021-08552021-08-10,  ,  ,  IT, 
ActInvest in Canada Act
PrecisAppointment of KATIE CURRAN of Ottawa, Ontario, to act as Chief Executive Officer of the Invest in Canada Hub, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year or until such time as a new Chief Executive Officer is appointed, whichever occurs first, effective August 19, 2021.
